(Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Extra effect on damage: Slay Magic

weap id [weapon]: 247 (Slay Magic)
damage [dmg]: Special
nbr of attacks [nratt]: 1
 
(Affects Magic Beings Only [magiconly], Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Internal Damage [internal], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 60E to forge (E6)

As the name implies, this sword was designed to destroy mages. The sword gives increased magic resistance to its wielder and anyone hit by the blade will be struck unconscious. This power of the Mage Bane cannot be stopped by any magic resistance. Magic beings struck by the weapon may be destroyed as the magical energies that animate them are dissolved.
